author: Becky Hardin
title: Grilled Salmon with Avocado Salsa Recipe
ingredients: 2 pounds salmon fillets (skin on or off)
2 pounds salmon fillets (skin on or off)

instructions_list: Mix the salt, chili powder, cumin, paprika, onion powder, and black pepper together. Rub the salmon fillets with olive oil and this seasoning mix.
Combine the avocado, onion, lime juice, and cilantro. Chill until serving time.
Grill the salmon to desired doneness (about 3-4 minutes per side).
Top with avocado salsa and enjoy!
